text: Evolution of COS URL MAPPING : it would be very useful if we could bulk delete redirections and not just one by one !

Evolution of CODE STRUCTURE : for module structure, it would be great to change <span class="hs_cos_wrapper"> by <div class="hs_cos_wrapper"> because for W3C it's impossible to have children in <span> (<div>, <h>...). That's why there are so many errors in COS structure
